channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Report Says Illegal Aliens Responsible for Up to 75% of Violent Crime Arrests in Midtown Manhattan

item.title: Musk's xAI Has Discussed Deal for Share in Future Tesla Revenue
item.description: Under a proposed arrangement, the startup would give Tesla access to its AI technology in exchange for a slice of the carmaker’s software revenue.

item.title: Trump campaigned in Wisconsin; Harris preps for debate
item.description: Get the latest news from the 2024 campaign trail in the contest between Vice President Kamala Harris and former president Donald Trump.

item.title: Trump says he would name Elon Musk head of government efficiency commission
The Battle to Ban Screens From School Now Includes Chromebooks and Tablets
item.description: After working to ban phones in the classroom, parents are now seeking a return to pencil and paper.

item.title: Harris targets small business tax break in contrast with Trump’s corporate tax cuts
item.description: The vice president looks to beef up her economic plans ahead of next week's debate.

item.title: Testosterone Clinics Sell Virility. Some Men End Up With Infertility.
item.description: Promoters in the booming steroid business tout a boost in the gym and the bedroom, but few talk about the possible side effects.

item.title: How Republicans and Democrats paint starkly different pictures of America
item.description: This summer's conventions featured strongly diverging visions of the future — and the present.

item.title: Vance warns of China’s influence during Michigan rally
item.description: Vance’s rally Tuesday was the first of a series of events in Rust Belt swing states that he and Trump are visiting this week.

item.title: OpenAI Co-Founder Ilya Sutskever's New AI Firm Raises $1 Billion
item.description: OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever’s new firm, aimed at building “safe” artificial intelligence models, has raised $1 billion from investors.
